dataRoles.name: ID
dataRoles.description: A unique ID that identifies each cluster.

dataRoles.name: Name
dataRoles.description: A label to display on top of each cluster.

dataRoles.name: Count
dataRoles.description: The number of members of this cluster.

dataRoles.name: Bucket
dataRoles.description: Optional values to be used to segment the members of this cluster in groups.

dataRoles.name: ImageUrl
dataRoles.description: Up to four optional images to display as the cluster's background.

dataRoles.name: BackgroundColor
dataRoles.description: The background color to display as the cluster's background when images are not present.

dataRoles.name: LinkTo
dataRoles.description: Optional IDs of other clusters related to this cluster.

dataRoles.name: LinkWeight
dataRoles.description: Optional strength of the link between this cluster and the other clusters it is related to.

initialCount.description: The maximum number of clusters to display.

layout.description: Defines how the clusters are positioned on the screen.

imageBlur.description: Defines if the background images in clusters should be blurred.

normalColor.description: Defined the base color for the persona's gauges.

selectedColor.description: Defined the base color of the persona's gauges when selection is active.

maxDataRows.description: The maximum number of data rows to load from the original data
